mapper.insert: insert into goods_info(goods_id, goods_name, price, variety, detail, pic_address, link, plat_form) values (#{goods_id}, #{goods_name}, #{price}, #{variety}, #{detail}, #{pic_address}, #{link}, #{plat_form})
mapper.select: select * from goods_info order by month_sale desc
select * from goods_info where variety like #{variety} order by month_sale desc
